Given a user is on the login page "https://mexil.it/chroma_tech_academy/dev/site/login".passed When user logs in with valid credentials username "general@teacher.com" and password "123456".failed And navigates to Student Information Module.................................skipped And navigates to Student Admission Submodule................................skipped Then user is directed to Student Admission page with the text "Student Admission".skipped And enters Student unique Admission Number "65015887".......................skipped And selects Class "SDET" and Section "Testing Fundamentals".................skipped And enters Students first name "CHROMA" and last name "TECH"................skipped And selects gender "Female".................................................skipped And enters Date of Birth "04/01/1990".......................................skipped And for Parent Guardian Details enters mothers name "CHROMA MOM"............skipped And for If Guardian Is field clicks on Mother radio button..................skipped And enters Guardian Phone number "7036875816"...............................skipped When user clicks on save button.............................................skipped Then student is succesfully saved and confirmation message displays "Record Saved Successfully".skipped When user navigates to Bulk Delete submodule................................skipped And for Bulk Delete selects Class "SDET" and Section "Testing Fundamentals".skipped And clicks search button....................................................skipped Then admitted student with first name "CHROMA" and last name "TECH" is deleted for testing purposes.skipped

testcase.name: Student Admission 3
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the login page "https://mexil.it/chroma_tech_academy/test/site/login".passed When user logs in with valid credentials username "general@teacher.com" and password "123456".passed And navigates to Student Information Module.................................passed And navigates to Student Admission Submodule................................passed Then user is directed to Student Admission page with the text "Student Admission".passed And enters Student unique Admission Number "65015887".......................passed And selects Class "Cyber Security" and Section "Networking Fundamentals"....passed And enters Students first name "SHOMIR" and last name "TECH"................passed And selects gender "Male"...................................................passed And enters Date of Birth "03/10/1990".......................................passed And for Parent Guardian Details enters mothers name "WORST MOM".............passed And for If Guardian Is field clicks on Mother radio button..................passed And enters Guardian Phone number "7036871234"...............................passed When user clicks on save button.............................................passed Then student is succesfully saved and confirmation message displays "Record Saved Successfully".passed When user navigates to Bulk Delete submodule................................passed And for Bulk Delete selects Class "Cyber Security" and Section "Networking Fundamentals".passed And clicks search button....................................................passed Then admitted student with first name "SHOMIR" and last name "TECH" is deleted for testing purposes.passed

testcase.name: Student Admission 4
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the login page "https://mexil.it/chroma_tech_academy/stage/site/login".passed When user logs in with valid credentials username "general@teacher.com" and password "123456".passed And navigates to Student Information Module.................................passed And navigates to Student Admission Submodule................................passed Then user is directed to Student Admission page with the text "Student Admission".passed And enters Student unique Admission Number "65015887".......................passed And selects Class "Cyber Security" and Section "Networking Fundamentals"....passed And enters Students first name "ANDRES" and last name "TECH"................passed And selects gender "Male"...................................................passed And enters Date of Birth "03/10/1990".......................................passed And for Parent Guardian Details enters mothers name "GOOD MOM"..............passed And for If Guardian Is field clicks on Mother radio button..................passed And enters Guardian Phone number "7036871234"...............................passed When user clicks on save button.............................................passed Then student is succesfully saved and confirmation message displays "Record Saved Successfully".passed When user navigates to Bulk Delete submodule................................passed And for Bulk Delete selects Class "Cyber Security" and Section "Networking Fundamentals".passed And clicks search button....................................................passed Then admitted student with first name "ANDRES" and last name "TECH" is deleted for testing purposes.passed

testcase.name: Student Admission 5
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the login page "https://chroma.mexil.it/site/login"......passed When user logs in with valid credentials username "general@teacher.com" and password "123456".passed And navigates to Student Information Module.................................passed And navigates to Student Admission Submodule................................passed Then user is directed to Student Admission page with the text "Student Admission".passed And enters Student unique Admission Number "65015887".......................passed And selects Class "Cyber Security" and Section "Networking Fundamentals"....passed And enters Students first name "LUIS" and last name "TECH"..................passed And selects gender "Male"...................................................passed And enters Date of Birth "03/10/1990".......................................passed And for Parent Guardian Details enters mothers name "BETTER MOM"............passed And for If Guardian Is field clicks on Mother radio button..................passed And enters Guardian Phone number "7036871234"...............................passed When user clicks on save button.............................................passed Then student is succesfully saved and confirmation message displays "Record Saved Successfully".passed When user navigates to Bulk Delete submodule................................passed And for Bulk Delete selects Class "Cyber Security" and Section "Networking Fundamentals".passed And clicks search button....................................................passed Then admitted student with first name "LUIS" and last name "TECH" is deleted for testing purposes.passed
